tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trades (
	trade_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	symbol VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	entry_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
	exit_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
	entry_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	exit_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	profit DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE historical_price_movements (
    symbol VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    open_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    high_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    low_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    close_price DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trading_patterns (
    pattern_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    pattern_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    pattern_description TEXT,
    pattern_strength VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE trading_patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name VARCHAR(255),
    pattern_description TEXT,
    entry_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    exit_price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE price_movements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE trading_opportunities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
    opportunity_description TEXT,
    potential_profit DECIMAL(10,2),
    risk_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE PriceMovements ( 
 price_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 stock_name VARCHAR, 
 date TIMESTAMP, 
 open_price DECIMAL, 
 close_price DECIMAL, 
 high_price DECIMAL, 
 low_price DECIMAL 
);

CREATE TABLE HistoricalPriceData (
    price_date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE TradingOpportunities (
    opportunity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR(50),
    trade_date DATE,
    action VARCHAR(10),
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    opportunity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MarketParticipants (
    participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(100),
    participant_type VARCHAR(50),
    contact_info VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE TradeHistory (
    trade_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    action VARCHAR(10),
    price DECIMAL,
    quantity INT
);
